txt.en: Stone trolls can be found west of Maergrind.\n\nYou should destroy any of the stone trolls that you find.
'Ah, Gundabad looks more like a city now! Still there is dust to clear away and much more work to be done.'
Grámi Hornhelm can be found at Maergrind in Máttugard.\n\nYou should talk to Grámi Hornhelm.

'Since you are traversing Máttugard, might you have some time to clean up the place? It has been a long while since dwarves last occupied these halls. Máttugard is in a decent enough shape due in part to the ingenuity of the dwarves' mirror traps. A cave-troll caught in the trap's light will immediately turn to stone! No dwarf-city should have troll statues scattered about. They should be removed! As you know, trolls are not very bright, thus many have been caught in the mirror traps over the years.'
Master smith, Grámi Hornhelm, wants Máttugard cleaned up and looking more a city and less a tomb.
